Service Details: - Offers First Stage Recovery for Single Women, First Stage Recovery Moms and Babies for expectant moms and moms with babies, and along with teaching and tools from trusted community supporters, an in-house parenting program- Offers Semi-independent Living and Aftercare Program, the Community Kitchen and Offsite Aftercare
How to Apply: Please fill in the referral form on the website or download it and send the completed form to the office
Former Name: Bernard House; Esther Place Recovery House; Ethel House ; Fuller House; Karis Village; Sutherland House; ; Tomat House; Wallace House
